text: Rui Naiwei (芮迺偉) is a Chinese professional Go player active in South Korea. She is one of the strongest female Go players,She was the first female player to be promoted to 9 dan. and is the only woman to have won one of the major open Go titles.Major open Go titles are titles that both male and female players can attend. She also represented China in the 2010 Asian Games. ==AchievementsRui Naiwei at Sensei's LibraryRui Naiwei at GoBase== Title Years Held Domestic 17 Guksu 1999 Maxim Cup 2004 Women's Myungin 2000–2002, 2004–2007 Women's Guksu 2000–2002, 2006, 2007 Women's Kisung 2006 National Women's Individual 1986–1989 International 7 Jeongganjang Cup 2003 Hungchang Cup 2000, 2001 Eastern Airlines Cup 2000 Bohae Cup 1994, 1996, 1997 Title Runners-up Current 4 Guksu 2000 Maxim Cup 2003 Women's Guksu 2003 Women's Myungin 2003 ==Notes== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese sportspeople Category:Sportswomen Category:Asian Go players
title: Rui Naiwei
